resources.string: Effortlessly track and manage your expenses with a simple scan. Organize your spending, stay within budget, and gain control of your financesâ€”all in one app.
A mail has been sent to your email address. Just press the Verify button in that email, and this page will automatically proceed.
This will be just an indicator of how much you spent from the monthly budget. You can change this anytime in User Settings.
No categories created yet. To organize your transactions, create categories. Click on the Add button to create one.
